  1: <?php
  2: /**
  3:  * Ce fichier est développé pour la gestion de la librairie Mélanie2
  4:  * Cette Librairie permet d'accèder aux données sans avoir à implémenter de couche SQL
  5:  * Des objets génériques vont permettre d'accèder et de mettre à jour les données
  6:  *
  7:  * ORM M2 Copyright © 2017  PNE Annuaire et Messagerie/MEDDE
  8:  *
  9:  * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
 10:  * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
 11:  * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 12:  * (at your option) any later version.
 13:  *
 14:  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
 15:  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 16:  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
 17:  * GNU General Public License for more details.
 18:  *
 19:  * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 20:  * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
 21:  */
 22: namespace LibMelanie\Objects;
 23: 
 24: use LibMelanie\Lib\MagicObject;
 25: use LibMelanie\Interfaces\IObjectMelanie;
 26: use LibMelanie\Sql;
 27: use LibMelanie\Config\ConfigMelanie;
 28: use LibMelanie\Config\ConfigSQL;
 29: use LibMelanie\Config\MappingMelanie;
 30: use LibMelanie\Log\M2Log;
 31: 
 32: /**
 33:  * Traitement des listes de tâches Melanie2
 34:  * @author PNE Messagerie/Apitech
 35:  * @package Librairie Mélanie2
 36:  * @subpackage ORM
 37:  */
 38: class TaskslistMelanie extends MagicObject implements IObjectMelanie {
 39:     /**
 40:      * Nom de la table SQL liée à l'objet
 41:      * @var string $tableName
 42:      */
 43:     public $tableName;
 44: 
 45:     /**
 46:      * Constructeur de l'objet, appelé par PDO
 47:      */
 48:     function __construct() {
 49:         // Défini la classe courante
 50:         $this->get_class = get_class($this);
 51: 
 52:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->__construct()");
 53:         // Initialisation du backend SQL
 54:         Sql\DBMelanie::Initialize(ConfigSQL::$CURRENT_BACKEND);
 55: 
 56:         // Récupération du type d'objet en fonction de la class
 57:         $this->objectType = explode('\\',$this->get_class);
 58:         $this->objectType = $this->objectType[count($this->objectType)-1];
 59:         $this->tableName = MappingMelanie::$Table_Name[$this->objectType];
 60: 
 61:         if (isset(MappingMelanie::$Primary_Keys[$this->objectType])) {
 62:             if (is_array(MappingMelanie::$Primary_Keys[$this->objectType])) $this->primaryKeys = MappingMelanie::$Primary_Keys[$this->objectType];
 63:             else $this->primaryKeys = [MappingMelanie::$Primary_Keys[$this->objectType]];
 64:         }
 65:     }
 66: 
 67:     /**
 68:      * Chargement de l'objet
 69:      * need: $this->id
 70:      * need: $this->user_uid
 71:      * @return boolean isExist
 72:      */
 73:     function load() {
 74:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->load()");
 75:         if (!isset($this->id)) return false;
 76:         if (!isset($this->user_uid)) return false;
 77:         // Test si l'objet existe, pas besoin de load
 78:         if (is_bool($this->isExist) && $this->isLoaded) {
 79:           return $this->isExist;
 80:         }
 81:         $query = Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::listObjectsByUid;
 82:         // Replace name
 83:         $query = str_replace('{user_uid}', MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['owner'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
 84:         $query = str_replace('{datatree_name}', MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['id'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
 85:         $query = str_replace('{datatree_ctag}', MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['ctag'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
 86:         $query = str_replace('{datatree_synctoken}', MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['synctoken'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
 87:         $query = str_replace('{attribute_value}', MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['name'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
 88:         $query = str_replace('{perm_object}', MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['perm'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
 89:         $query = str_replace('{datatree_id}', MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['object_id'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
 90: 
 91:         // Params
 92:         $params = [
 93:                 "group_uid" => ConfigMelanie::TASKSLIST_GROUP_UID,
 94:                 "user_uid" => $this->user_uid,
 95:                 "datatree_name" => $this->id,
 96:                 "attribute_name" => ConfigMelanie::ATTRIBUTE_NAME_NAME,
 97:                 "attribute_perm" => ConfigMelanie::ATTRIBUTE_NAME_PERM,
 98:                 "attribute_permfg" => ConfigMelanie::ATTRIBUTE_NAME_PERMGROUP,
 99:         ];
100: 
101:         // Liste les calendriers de l'utilisateur
102:         $this->isExist = Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQueryToObject($query, $params, $this);
103:         if ($this->isExist) {
104:             //$this->getCTag();
105:             $this->initializeHasChanged();
106:         }
107:         // Les données sont chargées
108:         $this->isLoaded = true;
109:         return $this->isExist;
110:     }
111: 
112:     /**
113:      * (non-PHPdoc)
114:      * @see IObjectMelanie::save()
115:      */
116:     function save() {
117:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->save()");
118:         $insert = false;
119:         // Si les clés primaires ne sont pas définis, impossible de charger l'objet
120:         if (!isset($this->primaryKeys)) return null;
121: 
122:         // Ne rien sauvegarder si rien n'a changé
123:         $haschanged = false;
124:         foreach ($this->haschanged as $value) {
125:             $haschanged = $haschanged || $value;
126:             if ($haschanged) break;
127:         }
128:         if (!$haschanged) return null;
129:         // Si isExist est à null c'est qu'on n'a pas encore testé
130:         if (!is_bool($this->isExist)) {
131:           $this->isExist = $this->exists();
132:         }
133:         // Si l'objet existe on fait un UPDATE
134:         if ($this->isExist) {
135:             if (isset($this->haschanged[MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['name'][MappingMelanie::name]])
136:                     && $this->haschanged[MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['name'][MappingMelanie::name]]) {
137:                 $this->saveName();
138:             }
139:         } else {
140:             if (!isset($this->user_uid)) return false;
141:             // C'est une Insertion
142:             $insert = true;
143:             Sql\DBMelanie::BeginTransaction();
144:             $query = Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::insertObject;
145:             $res = Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery(Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::getNextObject);
146:             $datatree_id = $res[0][0];
147:             $datatree_name = isset($this->id) ? $this->id : md5(time() . $datatree_id);
148:             $params = [
149:                     'datatree_id' => $datatree_id,
150:                     'datatree_name' => $datatree_name,
151:                     'datatree_ctag' => md5($datatree_name),
152:                     'user_uid' => $this->user_uid,
153:                     'group_uid' => isset($this->group) ?  $this->group : ConfigMelanie::TASKSLIST_GROUP_UID,
154:             ];
155:             if (Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params)) {
156:                 $this->isExist = true;
157:                 // Name
158:                 $query = Sql\SqlObjectPropertyRequests::insertProperty;
159:                 $params = [
160:                         'datatree_id' => $datatree_id,
161:                         'attribute_name' => ConfigMelanie::ATTRIBUTE_NAME_NAME,
162:                         'attribute_key' => '',
163:                         'attribute_value' => isset($this->name) ?  $this->name : $datatree_name,
164:                 ];
165:                 if (!Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params)) {
166:                     Sql\DBMelanie::Rollback();
167:                     return null;
168:                 }
169:                 // owner
170:                 $query = Sql\SqlObjectPropertyRequests::insertProperty;
171:                 $params = [
172:                         'datatree_id' => $datatree_id,
173:                         'attribute_name' => ConfigMelanie::ATTRIBUTE_OWNER,
174:                         'attribute_key' => '',
175:                         'attribute_value' => $this->user_uid,
176:                 ];
177:                 if (!Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params)) {
178:                     Sql\DBMelanie::Rollback();
179:                     return null;
180:                 }
181:                 // perm
182:                 $query = Sql\SqlObjectPropertyRequests::insertProperty;
183:                 $params = [
184:                         'datatree_id' => $datatree_id,
185:                         'attribute_name' => ConfigMelanie::ATTRIBUTE_NAME_PERM,
186:                         'attribute_key' => $this->user_uid,
187:                         'attribute_value' => '30',
188:                 ];
189:                 if (!Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params)) {
190:                     Sql\DBMelanie::Rollback();
191:                     return null;
192:                 }
193:                 Sql\DBMelanie::Commit();
194:             } else {
195:                 Sql\DBMelanie::Rollback();
196:                 return null;
197:             }
198:         }
199:         if ($this->isExist) $this->initializeHasChanged();
200:         return $insert;
201:     }
202: 
203:     /**
204:      * (non-PHPdoc)
205:      * @see IObjectMelanie::delete()
206:      */
207:     function delete() {
208:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->exists()");
209:         if (!isset($this->tableName)) return false;
210: 
211:         // Si l'objet existe on fait un UPDATE
212:         if ($this->isExist
213:                 && isset($this->object_id)) {
214:             // Params
215:             $params = [
216:                     "datatree_id" => $this->object_id,
217:             ];
218:             $ok = true;
219:             Sql\DBMelanie::BeginTransaction();
220:             $query = Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::deleteObject1;
221:             // Supprimer l'objet
222:             $ok &= Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params);
223:             $query = Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::deleteObject2;
224:             // Supprimer l'objet
225:             $ok &= Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params);
226:             $query = Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::deleteObject3;
227:             $query = str_replace("{objects_table}", "nag_tasks", $query);
228:             $query = str_replace("{datatree_name}", MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['id'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
229:             // Params
230:             $params = [
231:                 "datatree_name" => $this->id,
232:             ];
233:             // Supprimer l'objet
234:             $ok &= Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params);
235:             // Ne pas supprimer du horde_histories qui part en timeout sur la prod
236:             // TODO: Trouver une solution
237: //              $query = Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::deleteObject4;
238: //              // Params
239: //              $params = [
240: //                      "object_uid" => ConfigMelanie::TASKSLIST_PREF_SCOPE.":".$this->id.":%",
241: //              ];
242: //              // Supprimer l'objet
243: //              $ok &= Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params);
244:       if ($ok) {
245:         Sql\DBMelanie::Commit();
246:         $this->initializeHasChanged();
247:         $this->isExist = false;
248:       }
249:       else Sql\DBMelanie::Rollback();
250:             return $ok;
251:         }
252:         return false;
253:     }
254: 
255:     /**
256:      * (non-PHPdoc)
257:      * @see IObjectMelanie::exists()
258:      */
259:     function exists() {
260:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->exists()");
261:         // Si les clés primaires et la table ne sont pas définies, impossible de charger l'objet
262:         if (!isset($this->tableName)) return false;
263:         // Test si l'objet existe, pas besoin de load
264:         if (is_bool($this->isExist)) {
265:           return $this->isExist;
266:         }
267:         // Paramètres de la requête
268:         $params = ['id' => $this->id, 'group' => $this->group];
269:         $whereClause = "datatree_name = :id AND group_uid = :group";
270: 
271:         $query = Sql\SqlObjectRequests::getObject;
272:         // Liste des champs
273:         $query = str_replace("{fields_list}", MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['object_id'][MappingMelanie::name], $query);
274:         // Nom de la table
275:         $query = str_replace("{table_name}", $this->tableName, $query);
276:         // Clause where
277:         $query = str_replace("{where_clause}", $whereClause, $query);
278: 
279:         // Liste les objets
280:         $res = Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params);
281:         $this->isExist = (count($res) >= 1);
282:         return $this->isExist;
283:     }
284: 
285:     /**
286:      * Fonction appelé après la génération de l'objet par PDO
287:      * Cette fonction est normalement auto appelée par le getList
288:      * Elle permet de définir les bon paramètres de l'objet
289:      * L'appel externe n'est donc pas nécessaire (mais cette méthode doit rester public)
290:      * @param bool $isExist si l'objet existe
291:      */
292:     function pdoConstruct($isExist) {
293:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->pdoConstruct($isExist)");
294:         $this->initializeHasChanged();
295:         $this->isExist = $isExist;
296:     }
297: 
298:     /**
299:      * Récupère la liste de toutes les tâches
300:      * need: $this->id
301:      * @return Task[]
302:      */
303:     function getAllTasks() {
304:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->getAllTasks()");
305:         if (!isset($this->id)) return false;
306: 
307:         // Params
308:         $params = [MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['id'][MappingMelanie::name] => $this->id];
309: 
310:         // Liste les tâches de la liste
311:         return Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery(Sql\SqlTaskRequests::listAllTasks, $params, 'LibMelanie\Objects\ObjectMelanie', 'TaskMelanie');
312:     }
313: 
314:     /**
315:      * Recupère le Tag associé à la liste de tâches
316:      * need: $this->id
317:      * @return string
318:      */
319:     function getCTag() {
320:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->getCTag()");
321:         if (!isset($this->id)) return false;
322:         if (!isset($this->ctag)) {
323:           // Params
324:           $params = [MappingMelanie::$Data_Mapping[$this->objectType]['id'][MappingMelanie::name] => $this->id];
325: 
326:           // Récupération du tag
327:           Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQueryToObject(Sql\SqlTaskRequests::getCTag, $params, $this);
328:           if (!isset($this->ctag)) $this->ctag = md5($this->id);
329:           M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->getCTag() this->ctag: " . $this->ctag);
330:         }
331: 
332:         return $this->ctag;
333:     }
334: 
335:   /**
336:      * Recupère le timezone par défaut pour le
337:      * need: $this->user_uid
338:      * 
339:      * @deprecated
340:      */
341:     function getTimezone() {
342:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->getTimezone()");
343:         if (!isset($this->user_uid)) return ConfigMelanie::CALENDAR_DEFAULT_TIMEZONE;
344: 
345:         if (!isset($this->timezone)) {
346:             // Replace name
347:             $query = str_replace('{pref_name}', 'timezone', Sql\SqlMelanieRequests::getUserPref);
348: 
349:             // Params
350:             $params = [
351:                     "user_uid" => $this->user_uid,
352:                     "pref_scope" => ConfigMelanie::PREF_SCOPE,
353:                     "pref_name" => ConfigMelanie::TZ_PREF_NAME
354:             ];
355: 
356:             // Récupération du timezone
357:             $res = Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQueryToObject($query, $params, $this);
358:             // Test si le timezone est valide en PHP
359:             try {
360:                 $tz = new \DateTimeZone($this->timezone);
361:             } catch (\Exception $ex) {
362:                 $this->timezone = ConfigMelanie::CALENDAR_DEFAULT_TIMEZONE;
363:             }
364:             M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->getTimezone() this->timezone: " . $this->timezone);
365:         }
366:         return $this->timezone;
367:     }
368: 
369:     /**
370:      * Sauvegarde le nom de l'objet
371:      */
372:     private function saveName() {
373:       // Si l'objet existe on fait un UPDATE
374:       if ($this->isExist
375:           && isset($this->object_id)
376:           && isset($this->name)) {
377:         $query = Sql\SqlObjectPropertyRequests::updateProperty;
378:         // Params
379:         $params = [
380:             "datatree_id" => $this->object_id,
381:             "attribute_value" => $this->name,
382:             "attribute_name" => ConfigMelanie::ATTRIBUTE_NAME_NAME,
383:         ];
384:         Sql\DBMelanie::ExecuteQuery($query, $params);
385:       }
386:     }
387: 
388:     /**
389:      * Gestion des droits
390:      * @param string $action
391:      * @return boolean
392:      */
393:     function asRight($action) {
394:         M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, $this->get_class."->asRight($action)");
395:         return (ConfigMelanie::$PERMS[$action] & $this->perm_taskslist) === ConfigMelanie::$PERMS[$action];
396:     }
397: }
